```{r}
mat40<-as.data.frame(DataTProv40$P)
for(i in seq(31))
{
 mode(mat40[,i])= "numeric"
  mat40[is.na(mat40[,i]), i] = 0
  print(sprintf("%d",i )  )
  print(unique(mat40[,i]))
}
mat40<-as.matrix(mat40)
```
